name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in **IT Operations**, **Systems Administration**, and **Database Management**. Proficient in **Linux**, with strong capabilities in **Shell Scripting** and **Bash** for automation tasks. Skilled in **Network Monitoring** and **Network Security** to ensure systems remain secure and efficient. Experienced in **Performance Tuning** to optimize application and system performance. Exceptionally capable in **Incident Management** and **Customer Support**, focusing on delivering high-quality solutions for clients.

In addition to my foundational proficiencies, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer utilizing **Python**, and having expertise in building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient with modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, and adept in working with **cloud services** including **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, while maintaining compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
